metadata.title: Spotify Playback Analytics
metadata.description: An application to analyze and visualize your Spotify listening history

fileUpload.title: Spotify Playback Analytics
fileUpload.description:
Analyze your complete Spotify listening history.
View your most played tracks, artists, and listening patterns by time.

step1.title: Step 1: Request Your Spotify Data
step1.openPrivacy: Open the 'Manage Your Data' page and select 'Extended streaming history' only, uncheck all other options.
step1.receiveEmail: You'll receive an email with your data within 30 days.
step1.downloadZip: Download my_spotify_data.zip using the instructions in the email.

step2.title: Step 2: Upload Your Data
step2.privacy: All data is processed in your browser. No data is collected.
step2.uploadButton: Click or drag to upload my_spotify_data.zip

footer.description:
This tool is designed to analyze extended streaming history data provided by Spotify.
All processing happens in your browser, and no data is sent to any server.

deleteData.description:
This action will completely delete your Spotify listening history data stored in your browser.
To analyze your data again, you'll need to re-upload the ZIP file.
deleteData.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete your Spotify listening history data stored in your browser? This action cannot be undone.
deleteData.success: Data successfully deleted. Redirecting to home page.
deleteData.error: An error occurred while deleting data.
